verses.verse: וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> took כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> Then all the people יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻזִּיָּ֔הוּ <S%H5818><s%> Uzziah וְה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> who בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיַּמְלִ֣יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> and made him king אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> the place אָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> in the room of his father אֲמַצְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H558><s%> Amaziah

ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> He בָּנָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> He built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵיל֔וֹת <S%H359><s%> Eloth וַיְשִׁיבֶ֖הָ <S%H7725><s%> and restored לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> it to Judah אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after שְׁכַֽב־ <S%H7901><s%> slept הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> with his fathers פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שֵׁ֨שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years עֻזִּיָּ֣הוּ <S%H5818><s%> [was] Uzziah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> and two שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> His mother's [יְכִילְיָה כ] (יְכָלְיָ֖ה <S%H3203><s%> Jecholiah ק) מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> did אֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <S%H558><s%> Amaziah אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> according to all that his father

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> continued לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> And he sought אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> in the days זְכַרְיָ֔הוּ <S%H2148><s%> of Zechariah הַמֵּבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> who had understanding בִּרְאֹ֣ת <S%H7200><s%> in the visions הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּבִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> and as long as דָּרְשׁ֣וֹ <S%H1875><s%> he sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִצְלִיח֖וֹ <S%H6743><s%> made him to prosper הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God ס

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> And he went forth וַיִּלָּ֣חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and warred בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> against the Philistines וַיִּפְרֹ֞ץ <S%H6555><s%> and brake down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ח֣וֹמַת <S%H2346><s%> the wall גַּ֗ת <S%H1661><s%> of Gath וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> חוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> and the wall יַבְנֵ֔ה <S%H2996><s%> of Jabneh וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> חוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> and the wall אַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <S%H795><s%> of Ashdod וַיִּבְנֶ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> and built עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּאַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <S%H795><s%> about Ashdod וּבַפְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> and among the Philistines

וַיַּעְזְרֵ֨הוּ <S%H5826><s%> helped הָֽאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֧ים <S%H6430><s%> him against the Philistines וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against [הָעַרְבִיִּים כ] (הָֽעַרְבִ֛ים <S%H6163><s%> Arabian ק) הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּגוּר־ בָּ֖עַל <S%H1485><s%> in Gurbaal וְהַמְּעוּנִֽים׃ <S%H4586><s%> and the Mehunims

וַיִּתְּנ֧וּ <S%H5414><s%> gave הָֽעַמּוֹנִ֛ים <S%H5984><s%> And the Ammonites מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> gifts לְעֻזִּיָּ֑הוּ <S%H5818><s%> to Uzziah וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> extended שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> and his name עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לְב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> [even] to the entering מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in of Egypt כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הֶחֱזִ֖יק <S%H2388><s%> for he strengthened עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> [himself] exceedingly

וַיִּ֨בֶן <S%H1129><s%> built עֻזִּיָּ֤הוּ <S%H5818><s%> Moreover Uzziah מִגְדָּלִים֙ <S%H4026><s%> towers בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שַׁ֧עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַפִּנָּ֛ה <S%H6438><s%> at the corner וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַגַּ֖יְא <S%H1516><s%> and at the valley וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and at הַמִּקְצ֑וֹעַ <S%H4740><s%> and at the turning וַֽיְחַזְּקֵֽם׃ <S%H2388><s%> [of the wall] and fortified

וַיִּ֨בֶן <S%H1129><s%> Also he built מִגְדָּלִ֜ים <S%H4026><s%> towers בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> in the desert וַיַּחְצֹב֙ <S%H2672><s%> and digged בֹּר֣וֹת <S%H953><s%> wells רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> many כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מִקְנֶה־ <S%H4735><s%> cattle רַּב֙ <S%H7227><s%> for he had much הָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> had ל֔וֹ וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <S%H8219><s%> both in the low country וּבַמִּישׁ֑וֹר <S%H4334><s%> and in the plains אִכָּרִ֣ים <S%H406><s%> husbandmen וְכֹֽרְמִ֗ים <S%H3755><s%> [also] and vine dressers בֶּהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains וּבַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3760><s%> and in Carmel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> for he loved אֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> husbandry הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> had ס

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> had לְעֻזִּיָּ֡הוּ <S%H5818><s%> Moreover Uzziah חַיִל֩ <S%H2428><s%> had an host עֹשֵׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> men מִלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> of fighting יוֹצְאֵ֧י <S%H3318><s%> that went out צָבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> to war לִגְד֗וּד <S%H1416><s%> by bands בְּמִסְפַּר֙ <S%H4557><s%> according to the number פְּקֻדָּתָ֔ם <S%H6486><s%> of their account בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand [יְעוּאֵל כ] (יְעִיאֵ֣ל <S%H3273><s%> Jeiel ק) הַסּוֹפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖הוּ <S%H4641><s%> and Maaseiah הַשּׁוֹטֵ֑ר <S%H7860><s%> the ruler עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> under יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> under the hand חֲנַנְיָ֔הוּ <S%H2608><s%> of Hananiah מִשָּׂרֵ֖י <S%H8269><s%> captains הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> [one] of the king's

כֹּ֠ל <S%H3605><s%> the whole מִסְפַּ֞ר <S%H4557><s%> The whole number רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> of the chief הָאָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְגִבּ֣וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty men חָ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour אַלְפַּ֖יִם <S%H505><s%> [were] two thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יָדָם֩ <S%H3027><s%> And under their hand חֵ֨יל <S%H2426><s%> army צָבָ֜א <S%H6635><s%> appointed time שְׁלֹ֧שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עוֹשֵׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> that made מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> war בְּכֹ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> power חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> with mighty לַעְזֹ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> to help לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָאוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> against the enemy

וַיָּכֶן֩ <S%H3559><s%> prepared לָהֶ֨ם <S%H1992><s%> like עֻזִּיָּ֜הוּ <S%H5818><s%> And Uzziah לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הַצָּבָ֗א <S%H6635><s%> for them throughout all the host מָגִנִּ֤ים <S%H4043><s%> shields וּרְמָחִים֙ <S%H7420><s%> and spears וְכ֣וֹבָעִ֔ים <S%H3553><s%> and helmets וְשִׁרְיֹנ֖וֹת <S%H8302><s%> and habergeons וּקְשָׁת֑וֹת <S%H7198><s%> and bows וּלְאַבְנֵ֖י <S%H68><s%> [to cast] stones קְלָעִֽים׃ <S%H7050><s%> and slings

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ ׀ <S%H6213><s%> And he made בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֨ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem חִשְּׁבֹנ֜וֹת <S%H2810><s%> engines מַחֲשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H4284><s%> invented חוֹשֵׁ֗ב <S%H2803><s%> by cunning men לִהְי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to be on הַמִּגְדָּלִים֙ <S%H4026><s%> to be on the towers וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הַפִּנּ֔וֹת <S%H6438><s%> and upon the bulwarks לִירוֹא֙ <S%H3384><s%> to shoot בַּֽחִצִּ֔ים <S%H2678><s%> arrow וּבָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹל֑וֹת <S%H1419><s%> and great וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> spread שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> withal And his name עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far לְמֵ֣רָח֔וֹק <S%H7350><s%> far abroad כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> till הִפְלִ֥יא <S%H6381><s%> for he was marvellously לְהֵעָזֵ֖ר <S%H5826><s%> helped עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָזָֽק׃ <S%H2388><s%> he was strong

וּכְחֶזְקָת֗וֹ <S%H2393><s%> But when he was strong גָּבַ֤הּ <S%H1361><s%> was lifted up לִבּוֹ֙ <S%H3820><s%> his heart עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לְהַשְׁחִ֔ית <S%H7843><s%> to [his] destruction וַיִּמְעַ֖ל <S%H4603><s%> for he transgressed בַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> his God וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> into the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְהַקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> to burn incense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <S%H7004><s%> of incense

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> went in אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> after עֲזַרְיָ֣הוּ <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְעִמּ֞וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with כֹּהֲנִ֧ים ׀ <S%H3548><s%> priests לַיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <S%H8084><s%> him and with him fourscore בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> men חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> [that were] valiant
